sect1.title: Using Different Transports
sect1.para: In case you want to send different e-mails through different connections, you can also pass the transport object directly to send() without a prior call to setDefaultTransport(). The passed object will override the default transport for the actual send() request.

example.title: Using Different Transports

note.title: Additional transports
note.para: Additional transports can be written by implementing Zend_Mail_Transport_Interface.
